briefTitle: Measurement of the Skin Sympathetic Nerve Activity
officialTitle: Recording Sympathetic Nerve Activity From the Skin During Surgery Under General Anesthesia : a Pilot Study
conditions: Skin Sympathetic Nerve Activity During General Anesthesia in Patients Undergoing Breast Cancer Surgery
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The skin sympathetic nerve activity presented as uV obtained via skin leads.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* patients scheduled to undergo resection of breast cancer under general anesthesia after insertion of laryngeal mask airway

Exclusion Criteria:

* Autonomic nervous system disease
* Medication acting on the autonomic nervous system
* Refuse to participate
